featured.text: Sullivan, while surveying a campground, felt that a cloud was 24 him, and tried all he could to run— but it got him anyway.
The most familiar aspect of Tai Chi Chuan is the hand form, which is a series of slow-flowing movements with poetic names 17 “dragons stirring up the wind” and “wave hands like clouds.”
The clouds parted and a _____ of light fell on the church, through the windows, and onto the floor.
A storm cloud “chased” him until he was struck.
Watching the sun ______ from a sea of clouds is a must-do activity for all visitors to Ali Mountain.

definition.zh_def: 雲：在大氣中懸浮的水滴或冰晶的集合，通常呈現白色或灰色，並能影響天氣。
definition.en_def: A cloud is a visible mass of condensed water vapor floating in the atmosphere, typically appearing white or gray and capable of influencing weather.
definition.example: The sky was filled with fluffy white clouds.
